description:
Why to Be a Mobile App and Games Entrepreneur?

There are 967.78 million smartphone devices has been sold and more than 80% internet user own a smartphone. According to statista, 102,062 million Apps downloaded worldwide and they predicted that the number of apps will be downloaded in 2017 is 268,692 million. Mobile users are now spending the majority of their time consuming digital media within mobile applications, according to a new study released by comScore. Mobile Apps eat up more of our time than desktop usage, accounting for 52% of the time spent using digital media. While desktop-based digital media consumption makes up the remaining 40%. So let's jump on this ever growing mobile app business.

In this course You will learn completely a step by step guide to become a mobile app and game entrepreneur.

You will learn

  1. What is the trait of successful apps
  2. How to make that killer app.
  3. How to research to get an app idea from Google keywordplanner, Topappchart, Appanie, Appstore....
  4. How to Hire a Cheap App and Games Developer from Freelancing site
  5. Non-Disclosure Agreement
  6. How to Buy Cheap App and Games Source Code from Chupamobile, Gamesalad, Codecanyon as low as $10
  7. App Store Optimization (App icon, App title, App Description, App screenshot, App keywords)
  8. Monetizing The Mobile Apps and Games from paid apps, Freemium Apps, In-app purchase, In-app upgrade and App advertising.

This course is more than 2 hour of content.

At the end of the course You will be ready to launch Your own Mobile App and Games Entrepreneurship and You will know how to run a successful business strategy.
title: How to Be a Mobile Apps and Games Entrepreneur
